attributes.review: I am horrified by how bad this app is... I downloaded it thinking it would give me clear skin, a better 🍑, and whiter teeth and to my dismay it did the complete opposite. I will be deleting this trash app immediately and downloading Tik Tok instead. G bye 🍊 garbage boi. 0 stars in my book. 🥴👋🏼
attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤢🤢

attributes.review: Horrible interface, not easy to use for a stupid trump supporter like myself. I can’t read or think for myself so this app is very hard to use. Bad color choice. Selective news. Not enough games to play. Overall not very fun :/
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!

attributes.review: Do not download this and I encourage you to leave a one star review this President poped up on my screen and it triggered my flight or fight and I went into cardiac arrest it’s mind boggling. For your safety and others, do not download this app✨💅🏻
attributes.title: Almost got a STROKE from this app

attributes.review: Download this app at your own risk. Your inbox will be invaded with the biggest, stinkiest piles of BS known on the planet. Before you know it, you will start going along with the stupidest most cockamamie false narrative! This app will RUIN AMERICA! Keep America Great by NOT using this app! I downloaded this app, and I regret it.
attributes.title: WORST MOST INCOMPETENT APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely disgusting, it shows john b from outer banks getting shot down by jj i don’t get it how in the world is he gonna do that i mean john b is ehh but jj is 🥰🥰🥰🥰 anyway this app is horrifying and do not recommend anyways bernie2020 bc trump has a little wewe anyways save barrón and melania ✨😼💅🏼💘🥰
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to the App Store. This should be taken down immediately. This is 100% the worst app I’ve ever had. It takes up so much space and take soo long to download. Please take down now.
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: This app is so bad that when I downloaded it my phone was supper slow and it would even glitch just like the app it is unbelievable that an app is just as bad as our horrible president.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It’s a horrible app that not only took forever to load but it crashes all the time. 😤After downloading this app my pet fish jumped out of its tank. 😪I don’t think it’s a coincidence. This app is horrible and I suggest nobody download it. 😡😡
attributes.userName: Hi all the people out there
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I’m going to keep sending 5 stars
attributes.title: Amazing

attributes.review: Wow!! I did not expect this from our president!! His app is way to slow I am appalled by how horrible this app is. I am usually not one to write reviews...but... wow. Just wow. I will not be using this app any more. Ugh. The audacity. For anyone thinking of getting this monstrosity of an app. BE WARNED. 🥰
